Title: Nikola Tesla: The Master of Electricity
Description: Embark on a journey to discover the life and legacy of Nikola Tesla, the genius who revolutionized the way we use electricity. Uncover the story of his groundbreaking inventions and his vision for a world powered by sustainable energy. #Innovators #NikolaTesla #Electricity #HistoryOfScience
